data.title: A small memorial to great men.
data.text: This is a small roadside memorial to heroes of law enforcement.  These men gave their lives for our safety and freedoms.  Take a few minutes of your time to stop by and pay your respects.

data.title: Wonderful tribute
data.text: The monuments, statues, and moving plaques saluting the local law enforcement is very inspiring. It is a small but appropriate tribute to those that serve and protect. Also, it is a peaceful place to stop and reflect while walking around downtown Chattanooga.
